title: Drawing, Design for Round Adjustable Dining Table on Octagonal Base, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Round Adjustable Dining Table on Octagonal Base
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower right: Dining Table; at lower right of image with arrow pointing to right foot: Brass; in graphite, upper right of image: 4'-6" top Extend to 12 feet
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Round molded top with dividing stretcher running across center suggested in graphite, raised on fluted columnar support with molded double band around bottom, sitting atop octagonal base terminating in 4 splayed legs with brass feet on casters.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Round Adjustable Dining Table on Octagonal Base, 1900–05. Pen and black ink, graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-174
